title: Incorrect reference to apache-solr-XX.jar in the README.txt of the binary distribution
description:
The README.txt bundled with binary distribution of SOLR 4.0 says:
dist/apache-solr-XX.jar
  The Apache Solr Libraries.  This JAR file is needed to compile
  Apache Solr Plugins (see http://wiki.apache.org/solr/SolrPlugins for
  more information).

The jar file does not exist there (or anywhere nearby). There seem to be instead a collection of jars.

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content: A patch for solr/README.txt with improved clarity.
